title: Camera Usage of the Spectator Client
body: Hello Help & Support, I had a quick question about the usage of the spectator client regarding the camera tool. Would I be able to hide the camera menu while I spectate? I'm trying to watch replays of my games to save clips for some videos but currently I can't hide the tool when I hide the HUD. Any help appreciated!

replies.body:
This is possible!

Two options that I think you'd find helpful:

1.  Use the Teamfight UI option (default hotkey is 'A')

2. Bind a key to the "Show/Hide HUD" option, which is unbound by default.  Looks like this:

http://imgur.com/7IekWjg
Thank you very much! I'll try this out tomorrow. Much appreciated!
